ForRestaurantsPage.heroHeading: Grow your restaurant without giving away your profits
ForRestaurantsPage.valueProp1Desc: 7% flat â€” no hidden fees, no mandatory promotions, no surprises.
ForRestaurantsPage.valueProp2Desc: No aggregator lock-in. Your repeat customers belong to you.
ForRestaurantsPage.valueProp3Desc: Branded installable app at foody7.com/r/your-restaurant. No $50,000 development cost.
ForRestaurantsPage.valueProp4Desc: Dedicated onboarding. Go live in under a week.
ForRestaurantsPage.step1Desc: Fill in the form below. We review every application within 24â€“48 hours.
ForRestaurantsPage.step2Desc: Menu upload, branding, photos â€” we help you get it right.
ForRestaurantsPage.step3Desc: Go live in under a week. Orders start immediately.
ForRestaurantsPage.pricingSubheading: No contracts. No lock-in. Cancel anytime.
ForRestaurantsPage.pricingEffectiveNote: * Effective rate = monthly price Ã· (orders Ã— avg order). Lower as volume grows.
ForRestaurantsPage.pricingOverflowHeading: What happens when you reach the cap?
ForRestaurantsPage.pricingOverflowText: Orders never stop. Once you hit your monthly cap, additional orders are billed at the standard 7% commission. You'll get a notification at 80% of your cap â€” upgrade on your terms, not ours.
ForRestaurantsPage.pwaHeading: Your Own App â€” Included With Every Plan
ForRestaurantsPage.pwaSubheading: Every restaurant on Foody7 gets a branded installable app at foody7.com/r/your-restaurant.
ForRestaurantsPage.pwaBrandingNote: All plans include a subtle "Powered by Foody7" footer. Full white-label is available for Enterprise clients on request.
ForRestaurantsPage.pwaMarketValue: Building a native iOS + Android app costs $30,000â€“100,000. Yours is included.
ForRestaurantsPage.faq1Q: How long does it take to get listed?
ForRestaurantsPage.faq1A: We review every application within 24â€“48 hours. Most restaurants go live within 3â€“7 days.
ForRestaurantsPage.faq2A: Foody7 is a pure marketplace â€” we connect your restaurant with customers and independent delivery providers. You are never forced to use a specific courier service.
ForRestaurantsPage.faq3A: Payments are processed through our platform. The order value minus commission is settled to your account on a regular billing cycle with full transaction visibility.
ForRestaurantsPage.faq4Q: What happens when I reach my order cap?
ForRestaurantsPage.faq4A: Orders never stop. Additional orders are billed at 7% commission. You'll get a notification at 80% of your cap so you can decide whether to upgrade â€” no pressure.
ForRestaurantsPage.faq5Q: Can I switch plans or cancel?
ForRestaurantsPage.faq5A: Yes â€” no lock-in contracts. Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime. Changes take effect from the next billing month.
ForRestaurantsPage.faq6Q: Do I keep my customer data?
ForRestaurantsPage.faq6A: Yes. Unlike Baemin, we do not use your customers' data to redirect them to other restaurants. Your customer relationships are yours.
ForRestaurantsPage.formSubheading: Fill in the form and we'll get back to you within 24â€“48 hours.
ForRestaurantsPage.formSuccess: Thank you! We'll be in touch within 24â€“48 hours.
